mapper.select: SELECT GENRE_NAME FROM GENRE ORDER BY GENRE_NAME ASC
SELECT * FROM MOVIE ORDER BY MOVIE_NO DESC
SELECT * FROM MOVIE ORDER BY MOVIE_OPEN ASC
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT * FROM MOVIE WHERE MOVIE_ST = 'Y' ORDER BY MOVIE_OPEN DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM <= 6
SELECT COUNT(PLAY_NO) FROM PLAY WHERE PLAY_END > SYSDATE

SELECT p.PLAY_NO , m.MOVIE_TITLE , c.CINEMA_AREA , c.CINEMA_NAME , s.SCREEN_NAME, TO_CHAR(p.PLAY_START, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS PLAY_START , TO_CHAR(p.PLAY_END, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS PLAY_END , s.SCREEN_STYLE , m.MOVIE_NO FROM PLAY p INNER JOIN SCREEN s ON p.SCREEN_NO = s.SCREEN_NO INNER JOIN CINEMA c ON s.CINEMA_NAME = c.CINEMA_NAME INNER JOIN MOVIE m ON p.MOVIE_NO = m.MOVIE_NO WHERE p.PLAY_END > SYSDATE ORDER BY p.PLAY_START ASC
SELECT COUNT(PLAY_NO) FROM PLAY WHERE PLAY_END < SYSDATE

SELECT p.PLAY_NO , m.MOVIE_TITLE , c.CINEMA_AREA , c.CINEMA_NAME , s.SCREEN_NAME, TO_CHAR(p.PLAY_START, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS PLAY_START , TO_CHAR(p.PLAY_END, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS PLAY_END , s.SCREEN_STYLE , m.MOVIE_NO FROM PLAY p INNER JOIN SCREEN s ON p.SCREEN_NO = s.SCREEN_NO INNER JOIN CINEMA c ON s.CINEMA_NAME = c.CINEMA_NAME INNER JOIN MOVIE m ON p.MOVIE_NO = m.MOVIE_NO WHERE p.PLAY_END < SYSDATE ORDER BY p.PLAY_START ASC
SELECT ROUND(SUM(REV_LIKE) / COUNT(REV_LIKE), 1) FROM REVIEW WHERE MOVIE_NO = ${movieNo} AND REV_ST = 'N'

SELECT ROUND(((subquery1.booknum / subquery2.totalnum) * 100), 1) FROM (SELECT COUNT(MOVIE_NO) AS booknum FROM BOOK WHERE MOVIE_NO = ${movieNo} AND BOOK_ST = 'Y') subquery1, (SELECT COUNT(*) AS totalnum FROM BOOK WHERE BOOK_ST = 'Y') subquery2
